parameter.name: av.steps
Steps
parameter.comment: Set number of steps for Gaussian approximation

parameter.name: av.planes
Planes
parameter.comment: Set which planes to filter. By default all planes are filtered (YUV).

parameter.name: av.sigma
Sigma
parameter.comment: Set horizontal sigma, standard deviation of Gaussian blur. Determines the strength of the horizontal blur. Default is 10.

parameter.name: av.sigmaV
Vertical Sigma
parameter.comment: Set vertical sigma. Determines the strength of the vertical blur. Default is 10.
